File discovery¶

utils2p.find_metadata_file(directory)[source]¶

This functions find the path to the metadata file “Experiment.xml” created by ThorImage and returns it. If multiple files with this name are found, it throws and exception.

Parameters

directory (str) – Directory in which to search.

Returns

path – Path to metadata file.

Return type

str

Examples

>>> import utils2p
>>> utils2p.find_metadata_file("data/mouse_kidney_z_stack")
'data/mouse_kidney_z_stack/Experiment.xml'
utils2p.find_sync_file(directory)[source]¶

This functions find the path to the sync file “Episode001.h5” created by ThorSync and returns it. If multiple files with this name are found, it throws and exception.

Parameters

directory (str) – Directory in which to search.

Returns

path – Path to sync file.

Return type

str

Examples

>>> import utils2p
>>> utils2p.find_sync_file("data/mouse_kidney_z_stack")
'data/mouse_kidney_z_stack/Episode001.h5'
utils2p.find_seven_camera_metadata_file(directory)[source]¶

This functions find the path to the metadata file “capture_metadata.json” created by seven camera setup and returns it. If multiple files with this name are found, it throws and exception.

Parameters

directory (str) – Directory in which to search.

Returns

path – Path to capture metadata file.

Return type

str

Examples

>>> import utils2p
>>> utils2p.find_seven_camera_metadata_file("data/mouse_kidney_raw")
'data/mouse_kidney_raw/behData/images/capture_metadata.json'
utils2p.find_optical_flow_file(directory)[source]¶

This functions find the path to the optical flow file “OptFlow.txt” created by seven camera software and returns it. If multiple files with this name are found, it throws and exception.

Parameters

directory (str) – Directory in which to search.

Returns

path – Path to optical flow file.

Return type

str

Examples

>>> import utils2p
>>> utils2p.find_optical_flow_file("data/mouse_kidney_raw")
'data/mouse_kidney_raw/behData/OptFlowData/OptFlow.txt'
utils2p.find_raw_file(directory)[source]¶

This functions find the path to the raw file “Image_0001_0001.raw” created by ThorImage and returns it. If multiple files with this name are found, it throws and exception.

Parameters

directory (str) – Directory in which to search.

Returns

path – Path to raw file.

Return type

str

Examples

>>> import utils2p
>>> utils2p.find_raw_file("data/mouse_kidney_raw")
'data/mouse_kidney_raw/2p/Untitled_001/Image_0001_0001.raw'
